hero.title: Get in Touch with Dirty Boots Caf√©
hero.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you!

sections.heading: Connect with Us
sections.text: Whether you have a question, want to book an event, or just want to share your thoughts, we're here for you. Reach out anytime!

sections.heading: Follow Our Journey
sections.text: Stay updated on our latest pop-ups, events, and delicious offerings by following us on social media.

sections.heading: Join Our Community
sections.text: Sign up for our newsletter to receive updates, special offers, and heartfelt stories from the Dirty Boots family.
